patthana18.17:4.1: Āsavasampayuttaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.17:5.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.17:6.1: Āsavasampayuttaṃ hetuñca āsavavippayuttaṃ hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.17:6.4: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana18.17:7.1: Āsavasampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.17:8.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.17:8.4: Hetuyā cattāri … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate cattāri.
